weekly_top_story.headline: РФ Launches Drone and Missile Attack on Kyiv
weekly_top_story.summary: Russia launched a drone and missile attack on Kyiv, resulting in several casualties and injuries, highlighting escalating tensions in the region.
weekly_top_story.source: ABC News via School Assembly News

stories.headline: Typhoon Bualoi Kills 26 in Vietnam, Leaves 22 Missing
stories.summary: Typhoon Bualoi caused significant destruction in Vietnam, resulting in 26 deaths and 22 missing persons, with severe impacts on travel and infrastructure.

stories.headline: Multiple People Shot at Mormon Church in Michigan, USA
stories.summary: A shooting incident occurred at a Mormon church in Michigan, with multiple people injured, prompting a response from emergency services.

stories.headline: UAE Launches New Visit Visas for AI Experts and Entertainment Professionals
stories.summary: The UAE introduced new visa categories targeting AI specialists and entertainment professionals, aiming to attract global talent and enhance its economy.
